main event: Witness reported observing two bright lights in the sky over North Andover, Massachusetts, exhibiting high-speed maneuvers and hovering before accelerating and disappearing.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes,The objects were described as one blinking red light changing to a steady white light and a steady white light that blacked out,No sound was heard during the observation,The objects were evaluated and suggested to be possibly astronomical in nature,The witness was a 17-year-old male.
sighted object: two bright lights in the sky
